definitions.text: the state of needing something that is absent or unavailable
examples: there is a serious lack of insight into the problem
water is the critical deficiency in desert regions
for want of a nail the shoe was lost

definitions.text: anything that is necessary but lacking
examples: he had sufficient means to meet his simple needs
I tried to supply his wants
he was above all wishing and desire

definitions.text: feel or have a desire for; want strongly
examples: I want to go home now
This piano wants the attention of a competent tuner

definitions.text: hunt or look for; want for a particular reason
examples: Your former neighbor is wanted by the FBI

definitions.text: wish or demand the presence of
examples: I want you here at noon!

definitions.text: be without, lack; be deficient in
examples: want the strength to go on living
flood victims wanting food and shelter
